name: Hasteland
description:
The game has no tutorial, so here are some instructions:

  • There is no player, everything is mouse controlled
  • Click on tiles to perform activities
  • Initially, you have 2 resources: wood and food
  • Each unit of time, you consume some amount of food (automatically)
  • In winter, you use wood as fuel to keep warm (automatically)
  • Click on tree tile to chop it down, which gives you both resources
  • Every winter get an upgrade or unlock a new activity
  • On year 6 you unlock farming (two new resources, water and wheat)
  • Click on grass tile to make it into farmland
  • Click on farmland tile to plant seeds (you need 1 water to do this)
  • Click on water tile to collect water
  • Crops grow 10 seconds, click on fully grown tile to harvest, which gives you wheat
  • On year 8, a windmill is placed on one of the tiles
  • Click on windmill tile to transform all wheat you have into food
  • After year 10, there are no more events, you can continue playing indefinitely
